name: See You Later
storyline:
I think I have forgotten just how long I have spent with you.
When I look at the moon, it is you who scents the hair in the moon halo.
When I look at the sunset, it is you who holds me from behind in the sunset.
When winter comes, you are the warmest thing around me.
When summer comes, you are the one with the taste of iced coffee in your kiss.
The dos, the don'ts, the don'ts, the don'ts, the silly ones, the smart ones, the ones only the two of us can do, we've been through a million things together.
But the only thing we've never done is say goodbye properly.
summary: There are so many things I want to do with the rest of my life. Like dreaming with you, laze around with you, look at the moon, eat rice with you, go on the biggest wedding trip to Antarctica, and most importantly - say goodbye to you.
